title: 17-year-old girl shot in head inside NW Side trailer
content:
SAN ANTONIO - A 17-year-old girl has been rushed to a hospital after being shot in the head inside a trailer on the Northwest Side.
San Antonio police received a call about the shooting just after 5:30 a.m. Thursday. They said they found the teen inside a trailer in the 12100 block of Pebble Lane.
Her condition was not immediately known.
According to an officer at the scene, a man also was inside the home at the time of the shooting. He has been taken into custody for questioning. Police have not labeled him a suspect.
The circumstances surrounding the shooting remain under investigation.
